title: Rider transfer ticker: Politt, Sivakov, Baroncini to UAE, Trentin, Storer, Dainese to Tudor
content:
Follow all the main moves of the 2023 'transfer window' for the men's and women's pelotons.

Read the full article at Rider transfer ticker: Politt, Sivakov, Baroncini to UAE, Trentin, Storer, Dainese to Tudor on Velo.
